channel.title: Client running help
channel.description:
When i try to run a client it always says 'Java' is not recognised with an internal or external command.
I need some help with Java and envariables or w/e it is, please don't redirect me to a tutorial because the links are all upsated so i don't know which Java to download, could somebody please go through it with me.
Thank you :D

item.title: Client running help
item.dc:creator: @X_FLIPPY_X X___FLIPPY___X
item.description:
@X_FLIPPY_X wrote:

Errr… what? lol
I may have forgot to mention I know nothing about this lol

I have Java 6u18, I think, if thats any help

Nevermind I solved the problem I just had to re-install my Java again propperly

Read full topic
